column2: Claim the High Kingship of the Silvans
As the ruler of all the Wood Elves, you may claim the title of High King of the Silvan Elves.
Claim the High Kingship of Anadûnê
As ruler over all the Black Númenoreans, you may claim the title of High King of the Anadûnê.
Claim the High Kingship of Arnor
As ruler over Arthedain and either Cardolan or Rhudaur, you may claim the title of High King of Arnor.
If the last heir of Isildur is dead, you can claim the crown of Gondor for yourself as the Steward of Gondor.
column3: Si le dernier héritier d'Isildur est mort, vous pouvez réclamer la Couronne du Gondor.
